articles.author: Zarafshan Shiraz
articles.title: Warning signs of prostate cancer you should not ignore - Hindustan Times
articles.description: As per American Cancer Society, about 1 in 8 men will be diagnosed with a possibility of Prostate Cancer. Watch out for these warning signs of prostate cancer | Health
articles.content: Prostate gland is a walnut shaped gland situated just below the urinary bladder and according to health experts, when the gland enlarges in size, it produces symptoms like urgency of urination, Noctu… [+2124 chars]
